General.Name: Luks Kadife Ticaret ve Sanayi AS
General.Description: Lüks Kadife Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells velvet fabrics worldwide. The company's product includes velvet suit and curtain fabrics. It provides polyester, acrylic, cotton, viscose, and modal velvet for upholstery, drapery, and garment fabrics. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Mehmet  Mülayim
0.Title: Accounting Mang. and Investor Relations Mang.
